name: Pratik Kamble
title: Java Developer | Spring Boot | Cloud-Native Microservices | Kafka | PostgreSQL
summary: Java Developer with over 3 years of hands-on experience in designing and deploying scalable microservices using Spring Boot. Proven ability to optimize system performance, automate CI/CD pipelines, and support high-traffic applications with over 50,000 global users. Adept in Kafka, PostgreSQL, and cloud-first architectures, with a strong focus on performance tuning and system reliability.

projects.name: Residual Value Coefficient Microservice
highlights: Engineered a real-time coefficient update engine using Spring Boot and Kafka, enhancing brand coverage logic by 60%.
Designed rollback-safe controls for future-dated entries, reducing data discrepancies by 20%.
Automated backend persistence for CRUD operations, ensuring 100% data integrity and reducing manual errors.
Delivered a scalable solution that cut update turnaround time by 40%, boosting pricing agility.

projects.name: Freight Billing with Multi-Modal Invoicing
highlights: Architected domain-specific services to reduce business complexity by 40% and improve modularity.
Refactored legacy batch logic into stateless services, reducing latency by 40%.
Enabled seamless cloud migration with backup configuration and validation, ensuring compliance.
Redesigned the data model using Spring Data JPA for full compatibility with microservices.

projects.name: Sales Margin Analysis Microservice
highlights: Developed outbound REST clients with structured error handling and centralized logging.
Resolved transactional workflow issues, achieving 100% accuracy in data movement.
Explored Generative AI to auto-generate API documentation, enhancing developer productivity.

projects.name: Nutrition Application
projects.description: Developed a Spring Boot + PostgreSQL application with REST APIs to track meals and analyze dietary habits. Integrated secure authentication and advanced analytics to provide personalized insights. Optimized PostgreSQL queries to improve data recovery time by 35%.

projects.name: Online Job Portal Backend
projects.description: Built a backend system for a job portal using JDBC and Hibernate. Enhanced system responsiveness by 20% and ensured seamless data retrieval with robust database integrity mechanisms.

certifications.name: AWS Cloud Practitioner – Introduction to AWS

education.description: Strengthened analytical and technical skills through rigorous coursework and real-time application design.

achievements.title: Star Performer
achievements.description: Awarded for driving workflow innovation that led to a 30% increase in customer retention in client-facing operations.

achievements.title: CLAPatCapgemini
achievements.description: Recognized under Capgemini’s internal excellence program for delivering a client solution that generated €55,000 in profit.
